title: Mobile Application in Flutter
description: Designed a mobile application with seamless integration of a QR scanner using the Flutter framework, coupled with robust REST APIs for enhanced functionality and user experience.

title: Construction Management Software
description: Developed a Construction Management software by seamlessly integrating Typescript, C#, and SQL. Crafted and implemented supplementary features to elevate the overall user experience.

title: Web Application in React-Typescript
description: Developed two web applications for data visualization using TypeScript, integrated with the Hasura GraphQL engine and PostgreSQL database. Implemented Azure Maps visualizations to enhance the user experience and deliver dynamic, insightful displays of geographical data.
